string.text: What happened?! Is he dead?! Come back at once!
What happened?! Is he dead?! Take the measurements and come back immediately!
To deactivate the miracle machine, press ($$ACTION_USE$$)
To turn on the miracle machine press ($$ACTION_USE$$)
Well done, Swordsman, you made it to the lab. It's very important for us to study the machine that's there. Try to turn it off so we can examine it.

Look, the prototype can't protect against strong radiation for long. I have foreseen such a case, so when you are exposed to strong radiation, you will set a timer. When the timer expires, the prototype will no longer protect you. Be careful, and don't forget the timer.

Well done, Swordsman! The radiation is off, you're alive. We called in a couple of military helicopters to sweep the zombie area, so don't go in there yet, so you don't get shot at. Oh, by the way, if you're in the area, stop by the bunker.
